protein.general_function: Involved in transferase activity, transferring glycosyl groups
protein.specific_function: Responsible for the synthesis of complex-type N-linked oligosaccharides in many glycoproteins as well as the carbohydrate moieties of glycolipids

reference.reference_text: Sato T, Furukawa K, Bakker H, Van den Eijnden DH, Van Die I: Molecular cloning of a human cDNA encoding beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase with 37% identity to mammalian UDP-Gal:GlcNAc beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1998 Jan 20;95(2):472-7.
Lo NW, Shaper JH, Pevsner J, Shaper NL: The expanding beta 4-galactosyltransferase gene family: messages from the databanks. Glycobiology. 1998 May;8(5):517-26.
